intro: Ilex ludianensis, commonly known as the Ludian holly, is a species of evergreen shrub or small tree native to China. It belongs to the family Aquifoliaceae and is characterized by its dense, spiny foliage and small, dark berries. The plant typically grows in mountainous regions and is adapted to temperate climates.
